alert.note: Alert for Bertie; Gates; Hertford (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 20 at 10:52PM EST until January 22 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST FRIDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM FRIDAY TO 10 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph at the immediate coast. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow and a light glaze of ice in northeast North Carolina. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch. * WHERE...Portions of eastern and southeast Virginia and northeast North Carolina. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, from 7 AM Friday to 10 AM EST Saturday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 7 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions in Virginia or Maryland, please call 5 1 1. For the latest road information in North Carolina, go to http://DriveNC.gov.
